Prebon

Prebon watched Spears beg for this bot. What was so special about 
him? It didn't matter. In a few days she would be beggin...for me to 
hurt him! But for today he would spare him.

"Hammer, stop firing.("done boss.") I have shown Mercy today, but if 
he is insolent again, than he will not be so lucky."

Prebon pressed two buttons on the controls. One drew back the guns 
into the wall, but the other flipped out a very small spy cam in the 
top corner. The image was broadcasted to Hammer in the main bridge. 
He turned to Spears.

"Remember! No aiding him, no giving him anything without his 
permission. If he tries to escape you will do everything in your 
power to stop him, and if he still escapes, you will kill yourself a 
mile outside the base. Understand? Good."

Prebon walked to the main bridge where Hammer was watching Striker 
through the camera.

"If he tries anything, kill him. Soon we go for Ramulus."
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix continued to stare at the group.

"So who's gonna help me install these computer boards? We won't know 
about the ship without them!"
